Meerkat

Problem

Solution

Live Status

Welcome To

Meerkat

A decentralized blockchain application that tracks Cloud Service Providers' uptimes.

Meerkat is powered by:

Problem ?

Consumers depend heavily on reliable cloud services. Cloud services are scalable, convenient (especially for end users), and efficient.

However, currently consumers have no way of determining the trustworthiness of Cloud Service Providers, except for fuzzy reputation and the Cloud Service Providers' own assertion.

Solution !

Meerkat is the solution to the lack of transparency in the cloud service industry. Here's how it works:

  • Anyone who visits this website will be testing the listed cloud servers. A maximum of 20 requests is sent per visit.
  • The test results are sent to the Meerkat blockchain, where it is immutable and distributed.

Live Meerkat Status

These are all Cloud Service Providers' servers that Meerkat tests.

The test is considered successful if it returns 2xx HTTP status code.

It is updated in real-time.
